channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Esmond road, 5th January
item.description:
Whole of Esmond road requires a sweep of leaves and pedestrian litter. Please clear.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Esmond Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic lights and cones, 5th January
item.description:
This was for Work last week that hasn’t been completed. There’s nobody working there but it’s making it difficult for people to get in and out of the lane and the bin men haven’t collected our rubbish for a week. Is somebody coming back to finish the job? Essex water i presume .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fen Lane
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed, No MOT, Abandoned, 5th January
item.description:
This is the 3rd time reporting this car, please can it have a notice put on it for removal. Its been without an MOT for 6 months and no tax since October. This car has been here over 6 months now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 269, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Excessive littering for over a week, 5th January

item.title: Block tv aerial for Thurland House not working, 5th January
item.description:
Block tv aerial for Thurland House is not working, there is no signal to our televisions. I have checked our tv (flat 1) and also a neighbour at flat 12 reported his tv is not working due to the aerial problem. Please advise when this will be fixed. I have tried telephoning your repairs line & to date, received no answer or call back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Camilla Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not parking his car in the designated disabled bay, 5th January
item.description:
Couple of weeks ago my nephew got a parking ticket and rightfully so for parking his car in a disabled bay the problem is the designated car for that bay never parks his car in the disabled bay but in normal residential bay, taking one bay away from us.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Reighton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves have turned to mud. Fallen tree branches in road by playground. Gutters havent been done properly for years., 5th January

item.title: Confusing signage at and lack of compliance with parallel crossing, 5th January
item.description:
Small signs on bollards on each side of the cycling section tell cyclists 'Wait here', even though cyclists have priority. Motor vehicles frequently fail to stop when cyclists are crossing and there appears to be no enforcement of cyclist priority.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Morning Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
